name: PF Timer
author: Team Profit-Funnels

sections.description:
A very simple and easy to use plugin to add countdown timer to your wordpress website.
Countdown timer allow you to create nice and functional Countdown timer just in a few minutes.
This is the best way to create beautiful Countdown for your users.
You can use our Countdown timer in your posts/pages.

You can create countdown timer and display them with shortcode.
The easiest way to place your full customizable HTML5 Countdown Timer.

Complete shortcode with all parameters:

[pf-timer id=”1″]

  • ID: [pf-timer id=”1″] (timer id for which you want to display timer. This parameter is required.)

Features of WordPress PF Timer

  • Ability to create unlimited Countdowns timer.
  • Ability to create Countdown timer in pages/posts.
  • Ability to change background color and width.
  • Ability to change timezones.
  • Ability to set redirect url to redirect after the countdown time is completed
  • Option change the text of Days, hours, minutes and seconds OR show/hide Days, hours, minutes and seconds.
  • Light weight and fast
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the “PF Timer” plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add a new page and add desired short code in that.

short_description: A quick, easy way to add and display responsive timer on your website.
